roleset.name: natural disaster: mudslide, lahar
roleset.note: MUDFLOW-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to flow-n.02, lahar. (from mudflow.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: mudflow-n
example.text: The 70 mph mudflow tossed them among huge logs, debris, mud and ash.
